rukus.text: 19|83|Apani ki laksya karenani ye, amara kapheradera jan'ya sayatanaderake chere rekhechi, taderake manda kaje bisesabhabe pralubdha karara jan'ya [1]
19|84|kaje'i tadera bisaye apani taratari karabena na. Amara to gunachi tadera nirdharita kala [1]
19|85|yedina dayamayera nikata muttakiganake sam'manita mehamanarupe [1] amara samabeta karaba
19|86|ebam aparadhiderake trsnatura abasthaya jahannamera dike hamkiye niye yabo.
19|87|Yara dayamayera kacha theke pratisruti niyeche, tara chara ke'u suparisa karara malika habe na [1].
19|88|Ara tara bale, â€˜dayamaya santana grahana karechenaâ€™.
19|89|Tomara to emana eka bibhatsa bisayera abatarana karacha
19|90|yate asamanasamuha bidirna haye ya'oyara upakrama haya, ara yamina khanda-bikhanda ebam parbatamandali curna-bicurna haye apatita habe
19|91|e jan'ya ye, tara dayamayera prati santana arapa kare [1].
19|92|Athaca santana grahana kara dayamayera jan'ya sobhana naya
19|93|asamanasamuha o yamine emana ke'u ne'i, ye dayamayera kache bandarupe upasthita habe na.
19|94|Tini tadera sankhya janena ebam tini taderake bisesabhabe gune rekhechena [1].
19|95|Ara kiyamatera dina tadera saba'i tamra kache asabe ekaki abasthaya.
19|96|Niscaya yara imana ane o satkaja kare dayamaya abasya'i tadera jan'ya srsti karena bhalabasa [1].
19|97|Ara amara to apanara jabanite kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi yate apani ta dbara muttakiderake susambada dite parena ebam bitandapriya sampradayake ta dbara satarka karate parena.
19|98|Ara tadera age amara bahu prajanmake binasa karechi! Apani ki tadera karo astitba anubhaba karena athaba ksinatama sabda'o sunate pana [1]
